mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_ZIPCODE, M.MEMBER_ADDR1, M.MEMBER_ADDR2, P.POINT_TOTAL FROM MEMBER M, POINT P WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = 1 AND P.MEMBER_NO = 1 AND P.POINT_NO = (SELECT MAX(POINT_NO) FROM POINT)

SELECT DISTINCT C.COUPON_ID, C.COUPON_VALUE, C.COUPON_NO, M.COUPON_STATUS_NO FROM COUPON_STATUS M, COUPON C WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = 1 AND M.COUPON_USE_STATE = 0 AND M.COUPON_NO = C.COUPON_NO AND C.COUPON_S_VALIDITY <= SYSDATE AND C.COUPON_E_VALIDITY >= SYSDATE
